fields.name: Announcement
fields.description: The properties of any lab announcement associated with this lab

fields.name: ArtifactsStorageAccount
fields.description: The lab's artifact storage account.

fields.name: CreatedDate
fields.description: The creation date of the lab.

fields.name: DefaultPremiumStorageAccount
fields.description: The lab's default premium storage account.

fields.name: DefaultStorageAccount
fields.description: The lab's default storage account.

fields.name: EnvironmentPermission
fields.description: The access rights to be granted to the user when provisioning an environment

fields.name: ExtendedProperties
fields.description: Extended properties of the lab used for experimental features

fields.name: LabStorageType
fields.description: Type of storage used by the lab. It can be either Premium or Standard. Default is Premium.

fields.name: LoadBalancerId
fields.description: The load balancer used to for lab VMs that use shared IP address.

fields.name: MandatoryArtifactsResourceIdsLinux
fields.description: The ordered list of artifact resource IDs that should be applied on all Linux VM creations by default, prior to the artifacts specified by the user.

fields.name: MandatoryArtifactsResourceIdsWindows
fields.description: The ordered list of artifact resource IDs that should be applied on all Windows VM creations by default, prior to the artifacts specified by the user.

fields.name: NetworkSecurityGroupId
fields.description: The Network Security Group attached to the lab VMs Network interfaces to restrict open ports.

fields.name: PremiumDataDiskStorageAccount
fields.description: The lab's premium data disk storage account.

fields.name: PremiumDataDisks
fields.description:
The setting to enable usage of premium data disks.
When its value is 'Enabled', creation of standard or premium data disks is allowed.
When its value is 'Disabled', only creation of standard data disks is allowed.

fields.name: ProvisioningState
fields.description: The provisioning status of the resource.

fields.name: PublicIPId
fields.description: The public IP address for the lab's load balancer.

fields.name: Support
fields.description: The properties of any lab support message associated with this lab

fields.name: UniqueIdentifier
fields.description: The unique immutable identifier of a resource (Guid).

fields.name: VMCreationResourceGroup
fields.description: The resource group in which all new lab virtual machines will be created. To let DevTest Labs manage resource group creation, set this value to null.

fields.name: VaultName
fields.description: The lab's Key vault.
